name: Arthur Pisakhov
bio: An aspiring Full Stack Web Developer learning what the future generation of tech has to offer. I've been a computer enthusiast since i received my first PC. I enjoy making fun widget applications and applications that can help make people's lives easier. My expertise lies in the following: HTML, CSS, LESS, Javascript, Python, React, Redux, Node, Apollo, GraphQL, Prisma, and SQL. Always open to learn any stack the world has to offer.
